verses.text: \w This|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w then|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu, Eleazar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w ordained|strong="H4390"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w serve|strong="H3547"\w* \w as|strong="H3547"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu, however, \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w unauthorized|strong="H2114"\w* fire \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* since \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, only Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar \w served|strong="H3547"\w* \w as|strong="H3547"\w* \w priests|strong="H3547"\w* \w during|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron.
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3881"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w assist|strong="H8334"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w perform|strong="H5647"\w* \w duties|strong="H4931"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, attending \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w care|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* fulfill \w obligations|strong="H4931"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* attending \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

\w Assign|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* been \w given|strong="H5414"\w* exclusively \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H6485"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* carry out \w the|strong="H8104"\w* duties \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w*; \w but|strong="H4191"\w* \w any|strong="H4191"\w* \w outsider|strong="H2114"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w approaches|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* tabernacle \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.”
\w Again|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

“\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H3947"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w Mine|strong="H3478"\w*. \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Myself|strong="H6942"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* beast. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w Mine|strong="H3478"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

“\w Number|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w by|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* count \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* more.”

\w So|strong="H6485"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H6485"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w These|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3881"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: \w Libni|strong="H3845"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*. \w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

From \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* came \w the|strong="H1992"\w* Libnite \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H1648"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* Shimeite \w clan|strong="H4940"\w*; \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* more \w was|strong="H1121"\w* 7,500.

\w The|strong="H4940"\w* \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w were|strong="H4940"\w* \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* \w on|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, behind \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w leader|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* Eliasaph \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lael|strong="H3815"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w duties|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Gershonites \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* tent, its \w covering|strong="H4372"\w*, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w curtain|strong="H4539"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*,

\w From|strong="H6955"\w* \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* came \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Amramites|strong="H6020"\w*, \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Izharites|strong="H3325"\w*, \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w*, \w and|strong="H6955"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Uzzielites|strong="H5817"\w*; \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* more \w was|strong="H1121"\w* 8,600. \w They|strong="H2320"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* responsible \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w duties|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3605"\w* \w duties|strong="H4931"\w* \w were|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lampstand|strong="H4501"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w used|strong="H8334"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w them|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w curtain|strong="H4539"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w items|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; \w he|strong="H3881"\w* oversaw \w those|strong="H1121"\w* responsible \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w duties|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

From \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* came \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* \w Mahlites|strong="H4250"\w* \w and|strong="H4940"\w* \w Mushites|strong="H4188"\w*; \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H1992"\w* Merarite \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*.
